itemDescription: Olympic lacrosse player of Great Britain (1883-1954)

wikipedia_page.main: Charles Hubert Scott (October 27, 1883 – November 7, 1954) was a British lacrosse player who competed in the 1908 Summer Olympics. He was part of the British team which won the silver medal.

* Charles Scott (Wyoming politician) (born 1945), Republican member of the Wyoming Senate
